mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_tbl( profile_name, profile_email, profile_phone, profile_age, profile_gender, profile_address, profile_avatar ) VALUES( #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{avatar}, #{idTeam} );
mapper.select: SELECT profile_name as name, profile_email as email, profile_phone as phone, profile_age as age, profile_gender as gender, profile_address as address, profile_avatar as avatar, id_team as teamId FROM profile_tbl WHERE id= #{id}
SELECT * FROM profile_tbl ORDER BY ${value} DESC
SELECT * FROM profile_tbl Where ${nametype} LIKE #{name} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{page},#{pagesize}
